questions.content: Comments for the store management may______ at any checkout counter or givendirectly to your cashier.

Buffalo Aquarium has closed its popular sea lion habitat to renovate it in keeping with the Wildlife Council's______recommendations.
All Elk Club members are entitled to bring one guest ______month to the fitness center.
The adoption of FaverQuick technology______ processing speed at the Farmingham plant by nearly 9% over the last year.

The bus pass offers residents a cost-effective means of transportation,______ it is non- refundable and non-replaceable in the event of loss or theft.
If you would like to______the harbor by boat, there are many ferry operators near the docks.
Increased personnel costs have______ caused a hiring freeze in the Broward Corporation for the second year in a row.
Although media coverage tends to focus on the success stories of dot-coms, the______ of Internet start-up companies fail within one year.
Easy-care plants such as potted palms can bring a natural touch to______  sterile office buildings.
Parthenon Flooring Solutions offers a______ selection of engineered wood flooring as well as wood-look vinyl laminate at every price point.
Recent research has suggested that children do better when offered ______feedback rather than general praise.
The Committee for Preservation must approve all paint ______ for the historic row houses on Broad Street.
Hometown athlete Maurice Vickers______ Troy's new community activity center for a ribbon-cutting ceremony when it opens.
Employees ______ wish to schedule vacation time must contact Human Resources at least two weeks before the proposed time off.
The Universe X, Smart Mobile's new ______ in the smartphone market, is larger and less portable than its predecessor.
Reports of structural flaws in the design for the new bridge convinced the development committee to seek an ______ review from a third-party.
Mr. Yi has expressed concern______ Norus, Inc.'s use of single-serving coffee pods, citing both environmental and budgetary costs.
The Lakeham Web Design suite offers users the tools to craft their own high-quality Web sites and requires only basic of  ______ computer operations.
The economic value of hiring an assistant is disputable, but an extra pair of hands will  ______improve morale.
